quote: Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude. – Colin Powell
fact: A “quidnunc” is a person who is eager to know the latest news and gossip.
joke: I had a pair of racing snails. I removed their shells to make them more aerodynamic, but they became sluggish.
